CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 证实；证明；证明是；结果是；展现；展示；显示（自己）是；<法律>检验；认证；（用数学或科学原理）证明；验算；试（枪）；查验；鉴定；钻探；勘探；（面团）发酵

sample.mean: v. 批准；同意；认可；证明；显示；称许

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 证明；检验；表现出；钻探（prove的过去分词）
证明地；可查验地；试验得出地

word_mean_info__list.difference: 较正式用词，多指有签字盖章的、合符法律程序的书面证明。
指通过推理、辩论、实验或以实例来证明事物的正确与否。常用于理论、学说、定律等的证明上。
普通用词，指通过某种手段或方式提供证据以证实或证明某事物真实与否，某结论正确与否等情况。
较正式用词，既指出庭作证，提供证据，又指为某人或某事的是否真实提供证据或证明。
指证实事实或理论的真实性与正确性，使其能长期存在或为人们所接受。

word_group.brief_definition: 证明……真实性；证明……可靠性

bilingual.target: 用身份证证明你的身份。

bilingual.source: Then, I could prove that I'm innocent.
bilingual.target: 然后，我可以证明我是无辜的。

bilingual.source: The views from the cliff top are spectacular and I've got some photos to prove it.
bilingual.target: 悬崖顶的景色非常壮观，我拍了一些照片来证明。

bilingual.source: This is your chance to prove yourself.
bilingual.target: 这是你证明自己的机会。

bilingual.source: How can you prove he is not a liar?
bilingual.target: 你怎么能证明他不是说谎者？

bilingual.source: How can you prove you are not a liar?
bilingual.target: 你怎么能证明你不是骗子？

bilingual.source: Only time can prove his true worth.
bilingual.target: 只有时间能证明他的真正价值。

list.abstract: prove，英语单词，作动词，可翻译为证实、发酵、证明是、显示出、结果是、证明(遗嘱)的真实性和有效性等意思。

yingyinNormal.en: Wear a baseball cap backwards to prove your point?
yingyinNormal.zh: 反戴棒球帽以证明你的改变吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I know it, I felt it. Even if I can't prove it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我确定，我能感受到，即使我无法证明。

yingyinNormal.en: You stole my software, and I can prove it in court.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你偷了我的软件，并且我能在法庭上证明这一点

yingyinNormal.en: Objection! All in an effort to prove your clients were innocent?
yingyinNormal.zh: 反对！就为了证明你当事人的清白？

yingyinNormal.en: We prove that you never gave your mother consent to take those photos.
yingyinNormal.zh: 证明你从未允许你母亲拍那些照片。

yingyinNormal.en: How sure? A 100%. You got to be shitting me? Prove it to me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有多确定？100%你扯淡呢吧？证明给我看。

yingyinNormal.en: I couldn't prove it, but I knew it to be true. Ms. Dunbar...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我无法证明，可我知道确实如此。邓巴女士……

yingyinNormal.en: It just makes it more difficult for us to prove that you bought it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 付现让我们更难证明衣服确实是你买的。

yingyinNormal.en: You must prove yourself to the Khanate. Until you do, until you silence all doubters, I must be strong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你必须向汗国证明你自己，在你证明自己前，在你让心存质疑者闭嘴前，我必须保持强大。

yingyinNormal.en: And it's worth it. You get a chance to prove that you are the best! Cool.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但很值得，你有机会证明你最厉害。酷喔。

yingyinNormal.en: But it only makes me more determine to prove I'm worthy of your faith.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这更坚定了我的决心，向您证明我值得您信任。

yingyinNormal.en: That's impossible. I could perform an operation on you and prove it if you'd like.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不可能，我可以给你动个手术，向你证明。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, prove it. I want you to make a list and we're going to go through it point by point.
yingyinNormal.zh: 证明给我看，你列一张清单，我们逐条讨论。

yingyinNormal.en: For instance, there's a particle called a squark, which could prove supersymmetry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比如说，有个粒子叫超对称性夸克，它能证明超对称性。

yingyinNormal.en: That won't happen. How about a little wager? If I win, you let me back in the Scaring program. And what would that prove? That you were wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别作梦了。要不要赌一下？如果我赢了，就让我回去惊吓课程。那能证明什么？证明你错了。

yingyinNormal.en: No, she is not. Okay? I'll prove it to you. I'll call her right now. Phone's done.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她才不会，我证明给你看，我现在就打给她电话，擦好了。

yingyinNormal.en: And here is my Justice League membership card. But that doesn't prove I know Batman.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我正义联盟的会员卡，但是这不能证明我认识蝙蝠侠。

yingyinNormal.en: Your Honor, we'd like to call a hostile witness to prove that this isn't true.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法官阁下，我方请求传召一名敌对证人，证明对方所述并不属实。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll prove it to you. Look at me. I'm crossing into the station. 'Cause I'm taking the shortcut.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我证明给你看，看我，我进站了，因为我要走捷径。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I mean, why are you going to so much trouble to prove that you're smarter than Wolowitz?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我是说你为什么要费尽周折来证明你比沃罗威茨聪明呢？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 证实; 证明; 显示出

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 证实；证明；发酵；证明是；显示出；结果是；证明（遗嘱）的真实性和有效性；原来是；显示（自己的）才干

sense_info_list.zh: 证实; 证明; 显示出

examination_example.sentence: Marris distorts our findings which actually <highlight>prove</highlight> that zoos serve as an indispensable link between man and nature.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Marris歪曲了我们的发现，而这些发现实际上证明了动物园是人类和自然之间不可或缺的纽带。

examination_example.sentence: However, those correlations don't <highlight>prove</highlight> cause and effect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这些相关性并不能证明因果关系。

examination_example.sentence: After all, it was rumoured that smoking caused cancer for years before the evidence was found to <highlight>prove</highlight> a connection.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毕竟，吸烟导致癌症的谣言，在被证实之前，已经流传多年。

sense_info_list.en: subject a gun or other item to a testing process
show a particular result after a period of time

sample.mean: v. 批准；同意；认可；证明；显示；称许

word_usage.usage: prove可作系动词，表示“证明是，结果是”，不用于被动语态，其后常接“to be + 名词／形容词”，其中to be可以省略。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Grass-fed products have <highlight>proved</highlight> to be healthier and more nutritious.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 草饲产品被证实更健康，更有营养。

examination_example.sentence: They are not trying to <highlight>prove</highlight> that the use of digital devices reduces young people's wellbeing .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们并不是试图证明数字设备的使用会降低年轻人的幸福感。

examination_example.sentence: This does not <highlight>prove</highlight> causality, but is consistent with it. Meanwhile, TV use did not show this tracking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这并不证明因果关系，但与它一致。同时，跟踪调查不包括电视的使用。

examination_example.sentence: There are nonetheless several empirically <highlight>proven</highlight> benefits. One of those is efficiency.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经验表明，它还是有着不少好处的，其中之一就是会提高效率。

examination_example.sentence: What the designers of the American sportswear <highlight>proved</highlight> was that fashion is a genuine design art, answering to the demanding needs of service.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国运动服设计师证明时尚是一种真正的设计艺术，可以满足苛刻的服务需求。

sense_info_list.en: show a particular result after a period of time
subject a gun or other item to a testing process

sample.mean: v. 批准；同意；认可；证明；显示；称许

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Brent Ryan, who teaches urban design at MIT, says Songdo <highlight>proves</highlight> a universal principle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在麻省理工学院教授城市设计的 Brent Ryan 表示，松岛新城证实了一条放之四海而皆准的法则。

examination_example.sentence: Women have to do more than their male counterparts to <highlight>prove</highlight> themselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 女性必须比男性付出更多来证明自己。

examination_example.sentence: He wanted to "<highlight>prove</highlight> to the distant future that the French chefs of the 19th century were the most famous in the world."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他希望“向遥远的未来证明19世纪的法国厨师是世界上最出名的”。

examination_example.sentence: In fact, the camera could be the thing that <highlight>proves</highlight> that they didn't steal the $20, or knock the vase off the table.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，摄像头可能是证明他们没有偷那20美元，或是没有把花瓶从桌子上摔下来的证据。

examination_example.sentence: The experiment was a grand success and Talleyrand's association with French nobility would <highlight>prove</highlight> a profitable connection for Creme.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个实验取得了巨大成功，Talleyrand 与法国贵族的联姻将会对 Careme 有极大的好处。

sense_info_list.en: subject a gun or other item to a testing process
show a particular result after a period of time

sample.mean: v. 批准；同意；认可；证明；显示；称许

word_usage.usage:
①跟名词或代词：Who can prove it? 谁能证明这一点？
②跟to be引起的短语：My advice proved to be wrong. 我的建议证明是错误的。
③跟形容词：The extra room proved very useful when we had visitors. 当有人来拜访时，那间闲置的房间会非常有用的。
④跟从句：They will prove to you that I'm not lying. 他们会向你证明我不是在撒谎。
⑤跟复合结构：Facts have proved these worries groundless. 事实证明这些担忧是没有根据的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Lincoln's home in downtown Springfield, Illinois, has <highlight>proven</highlight> irresistible to visitors since it opened to the public.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 林肯位于伊利诺斯州斯普林菲尔德市中心的家，自从向公众开放以来，已经被证明是游客无法抗拒的。

examination_example.sentence: Today's state-of-the-art atomic (原子的) clocks have <highlight>proven</highlight> Einstein right.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现今最先进的原子钟已经证明爱因斯坦是正确的。
事实证明，他们的努力卓有成效。

sample.mean: v. 批准；同意；认可；证明；显示；称许

word_usage.usage:
①跟名词或代词：Who can prove it? 谁能证明这一点？
②跟to be引起的短语：My advice proved to be wrong. 我的建议证明是错误的。
③跟形容词：The extra room proved very useful when we had visitors. 当有人来拜访时，那间闲置的房间会非常有用的。
④跟从句：They will prove to you that I'm not lying. 他们会向你证明我不是在撒谎。
⑤跟复合结构：Facts have proved these worries groundless. 事实证明这些担忧是没有根据的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Choose one good quality of pigs and give some examples to <highlight>prove</highlight> (证明) it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 选择一种质量好的猪，并举例证明。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>prove</highlight> the writer often faces trouble in life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 证明作者在生活中经常遇到麻烦。

examination_example.sentence: Further studies are needed to <highlight>prove</highlight> the findings in other populations, settings and climates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 需要进一步的研究来证明在其他种群、环境和气候中的发现。

sample.mean: v. 批准；同意；认可；证明；显示；称许
